name: Monster Pang 2
description:
Fire exploding and boucing balls in Monster Ball and blast away!

Simple game functions with great excitement!
Blast away various types of monster balls!
Arcade game that was only playable in consoles is now available for your mobile!


== How to Play ==

Fires beads in top of the head to match target!

Completely burst all the beads on the screen to clear the stage!


*** Gameplay ***
(1) Joystick: Located in the lower left corner of the screen and control the character.

(2) Fire: Fire towards the monster


*** Game mode ***
1. CLASSIC mode: If you remove all the beads on the screen, you can go to the next stage.

2. PANIC mode: Monsters appear non stop as you burst away over and over to achieve highest score in this game. Try to beat the ranking score!
